timeline.message: Update DirectPath tests to use the new opt-in method instead of env var; Change fallback tests to blackhole all ipv4 and ipv6 DP addresses

timeline.bodyText: this is already up to 0.8.1, so I think if you rebase to the latest you should be all set for this dep: f0314a1#diff-2c948b36b2a278766864c47aecd503e1
timeline.author: kolea2
igorbernstein2
igorbernstein2

timeline.bodyText:
Please cleanup the constants as well:

remove DIRECT_PATH_ENV_VAR
update comment for DIRECT_PATH_ENDPOINT
timeline.author: igorbernstein2

timeline.bodyText: Please add a comment explaining where these magic subnets came from.
timeline.author: igorbernstein2

timeline.bodyText:
Make sure to update AbstractTestEnv as well:

  
    
      java-bigtable/google-cloud-bigtable/src/test/java/com/google/cloud/bigtable/test_helpers/env/AbstractTestEnv.java
    
    
         Line 78
      in
      7b7b2f2
    
    
    
    

        
          
           return "bigtable".equals(System.getenv("GOOGLE_CLOUD_ENABLE_DIRECT_PATH"));
timeline.author: igorbernstein2

replies.bodyText: just for my understanding, how come we are switching from env variable to system property?
replies.author: kolea2

replies.bodyText: We have decided to use setAttemptDirectPath instead of the env var, for client library to enable DirectPath. The system property is temporarily used for testing purposes. Once DirectPath ipv4 support is fully rolled out, we will need to have a new release of the client library, with this sys property being removed, and setAttemptDirectPath being TRUE by default.
replies.author: WeiranFang

timeline.bodyText:
Maybe simplify to:
isDpAddr = addr.startsWith(DP_IPV6_PREFIX) ||  addr.startsWith(DP_IPV4_PREFIX));
timeline.author: igorbernstein2

timeline.bodyText:
Please remove the printlns.
If they are needed then maybe convert them into log.trace() or debug()

replies.bodyText: Those were for my local debugging. Removed.
replies.author: WeiranFang
